theGamblignant:Gank.NAME: Gank
theGamblignant:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add !M! to your next roll.

theGamblignant:CunningAction.NAME: Cunning Action
theGamblignant:CunningAction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Block equal to blocked damage dealt.

theGamblignant:JumpKick.NAME: Jump Kick
theGamblignant:JumpKick.DESCRIPTION: Take damage equal to the target's Block. Deal !D! damage.

theGamblignant:Gleam.NAME: Gleam
theGamblignant:Gleam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and gain !M! Luck.

theGamblignant:FlipKick.NAME: Flip Kick
theGamblignant:FlipKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If [#efc851]1d2[] = 2, gain 1 Energy and draw a card.

theGamblignant:Gaslight.NAME: Gaslight
theGamblignant:Gaslight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals 1 additional damage for each stack of the target's buffs and debuffs.

theGamblignant:Fold.NAME: Fold
theGamblignant:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

theGamblignant:BigBlind.NAME: Big Blind
theGamblignant:BigBlind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Luck. All enemies gain 2 Strength this turn.

theGamblignant:Reroll.NAME: Reroll
theGamblignant:Reroll.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw [#efc851]1d6[] cards. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:Reroll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw [#efc851]1d6[] cards.

theGamblignant:BanefulBunker.NAME: Baneful Bunker
theGamblignant:BanefulBunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Poison to attackers this turn.

theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.NAME: Doomsday Device
theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.DESCRIPTION: After 8 turns, deal 88 damage to all enemies. Exhaust.
theGamblignant:DoomsdayDevice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. After 8 turns, deal 88 damage to all enemies. Exhaust.

theGamblignant:ScourgePurge.NAME: Scourge Purge
theGamblignant:ScourgePurge.DESCRIPTION: Apply Poison equal to your Gloom. Lose all Gloom.
theGamblignant:ScourgePurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Poison equal to your Gloom to all enemies. Lose all Gloom.

theGamblignant:QuiverDance.NAME: Quiver Dance
theGamblignant:QuiverDance.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! to the first roll you make each turn.

theGamblignant:FengShui.NAME: Feng Shui
theGamblignant:FengShui.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [#efc851]1d4[] Block.
theGamblignant:FengShui.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Gain [#efc851]1d6[] Block.

theGamblignant:TrashTalk.NAME: Trash Talk
theGamblignant:TrashTalk.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you roll a 1, apply !M! Poison to all enemies.

theGamblignant:Superstition.NAME: Superstition
theGamblignant:Superstition.DESCRIPTION: While you have Gloom, gain !M! Dexterity.

theGamblignant:Gatekeep.NAME: Gatekeep
theGamblignant:Gatekeep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you fully Block an attack, the attacker loses 1 Strength.

theGamblignant:AncestralAwakening.NAME: Ancestral Awakening
theGamblignant:AncestralAwakening.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a D8 is rolled, it lands on 8.
